content: Hi All,I have one main IG and several child IG's.I want to link the child IGs in the main iG.When i try to run or publish the main iG,i want to publish both main and child IG also.Please help me to figure out this.Thank You
this is not supported at the moment, and not on the feature list. what is it you want to achieve?
@Grahame Grieve I want to achive like. http://www.fhir.org/guides/registry
